name: Santa Claus - Gifts Saviour
description:
Santa Claus - Gifts Saviour

A gift attack is approaching you and the enemy has launched a vicious gift attack on the front line. It’s time to brace yourself and get ready for most gift fight with ferocious opponents. Dangerous giftattack is approaching you.
Challenge yourself with the next mission or replay a custom mission!
3D graphics with flight control simulation!

Have Fun!
